General.Name: Nurminen Logistics Oyj
General.Description: Nurminen Logistics Oyj provides logistics services in Finland, Russia, and Baltic countries. The company offers railway transport, goods handling, terminal, and forwarding and customs clearance services, as well as multimodal transport services. It also provides warehousing and dangerous substances transportation services. Nurminen Logistics Oyj was founded in 1886 and is headquartered in Helsinki, Finland.

8.Name: Mr. Lukshin  Dmitriy
8.Title: Chief Exec. Officer of OOO Nurminen Logistics & Rail Services
